name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leroy LOCKWOOD, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leroy LOCKWOOD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Westmoreland County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Dante G. Bertani, Public Defender, Greensburg, for appellant.
Donetta W. Ambrose, Asst. Dist. Atty., Greensburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 210
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leroy LOCKWOOD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 2, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Dante G. Bertani, Public Defender, Greensburg, for appellant.
Donetta W. Ambrose, Asst. Dist. Atty., Greensburg, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
